attributes.action: 2x vaccinated should be allowed to isolate at home if flying in from red list
attributes.additional_details: Allow double vaccinated people to self isolate at home .
attributes.background: To allow Double vaccinated individuals , self isolate at home ; rather then Government isolation Center and pay so much money . Regardless, of it being on the red list .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072

The Petitions Committee has scheduled a debate on the above petition for Monday 17 January 2022.
